entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
